summary: Has blue, redder, and green options for the glow of the Daedric Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Small history blurb; I uploaded a similar mod to this years ago, but lost interest in Skyrim shortly after. Now I'm back to playing, and wanted to share this again.

The .zip contains meshes of the Daedric armor set in these colors:
[color=#0000ff][size=4][b]Blue[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Redder[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][b]Green[/b][/size][/color]

Installation:

Manual;
Place the meshes file for the color you want in the Data folder.

Mod Organizer;
Set the color you want as the Data folder

NMM
Umm... I don't remember how to use this, so if someone posts the instructions I'll update this.
author: VampireKittyCat
